com.ibm.streamsx.topology.spi.operators

Class Source

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.streams.operator.AbstractOperator

            • com.ibm.streamsx.topology.spi.operators.Source
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.ibm.streams.operator.Operator, com.ibm.streamsx.topology.internal.functional.ops.Functional, FunctionalOperator, java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    @OutputPorts(value=@OutputPortSet(cardinality=1))
 @SharedLoader
public abstract class Source
extends com.ibm.streamsx.topology.internal.functional.ops.FunctionSource
implements FunctionalOperator
    A functional source operator. This is part of the SPI to allow additional functional style functionality to built using the primitives provided by this toolkit. Only methods explicitly declared in this class are part of the API. Use of super-class methods (except those defined by java.lang.Object) is not recommended and such methods may change or be removed at any time.

      • getFunctionContext

        public final FunctionContext getFunctionContext()
        Get the functional context seen by the logic. This is effectively a clean subset of OperatorContext that hides any operator specific functionality.
        Specified by:
        getFunctionContext in interface FunctionalOperator
        Overrides:

      • getLogic

        public final Supplier<java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.Object>> getLogic()
        Return the equivalent logic that was passed into Invoker#invokeSource(com.ibm.streamsx.topology.Topology, Class, Supplier, java.util.Map). Note it will not be the same reference as the logic will have been serialized and de-serialized for execution within the Streams context.
        Overrides:
        getLogic in class com.ibm.streamsx.topology.internal.functional.ops.FunctionSource
